component.notes: Profile should work with all heos models. Only provides access to local inputs. Does not provide LMQ in any way. Make sure the Heos device is setup with a static/reserved ip Add profile to blueprint, connect ethernet and enter IP address on the wire. Upload To get your Hostname, search state center for PID_ and you should see a list of all the heos players and their IDs. Enter the ID in the hostname field exactly as shown. Upload and test.
